name: SMONG
description:
Do you want to compete against one of your friends or against the AI? Then this might be the right game for you.

This game is like Pong, but with a turn-based system and you shoot the ball like in VIDEOBALL. It is like Pong, but different.

Controls

Player 1: A / D - Left / Right, W - Shoot

Player 2: Left Arrow Key / Right Arrow Key - Left / Right, Up Arrow Key - Shoot
